title: Studying Boys
description: Meet Frances Spinelli, the girl with her nose buried in a book. But things change.Homework has always been her top priority. That and crushing on the wrong guy, then doing nothing about it. So when Frances's friends blackmail her into stepping out of her comfort zone she does them one better. She goes totally out of control.Dancing with a football-playing senior at a night club. Lying to her parents. Getting grounded... probably for life. This isn't the Frances she wants to be. But she certainly doesn't want to go back to being a total geek.So what's a bookworm to do? After all that time studying for midterms, maybe Frances really just has to learn how to study boys.
author: Stephie Davis
